entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:24 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: WSW 37 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then a few flurries. Blowing snow. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
